item.title: URL shortener
item.description: This is a simple URL shortener made for learning the basics of Flask and Vue.

item.title: Reportforce
item.description: This project is a client for Salesforce’s Analytics REST API for downloading reports.

item.title: MapsBR
item.description: This library provides an interface to get geospatial data from an IBGE API or an ArcGIS server in an augmented geopandas DataFrame.

item.title: Seriesbr
item.description: A Python package to get time series from brazilian government institutions’ databases, such as the Brazilian Central Bank, Institute of Applied Economic Research and Brazilian Institute of Geography and Statistics.
